animeTitle: Mina no Mura no Gomi Soudou
animeDescription: Mina's family has a baby goat, but it dies from eating a plastic bag left in the paddy field. Some children are absent from school due to health problems caused by waste. So, the villagers have a meeting to discuss what they can do to improve waste management.(Source: ACCU)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: Mina no Mura to Mori', 'Sequel: Mina no Bousai Mura Dzukuri']
